channel.title: Global objects, yes, I have read the tut
channel.description:
Hello. I am working on a pimpscape source, and trying to reset alot of aspects on it to make it a somewhat original server.
Currently I have changed the respawn place, but I want to add dummies/hay/doors there. The area is the magebank, and I have read fedexers tut on adding global objects, but i keep getting errors and I really don't understand the tut. I would truly appreciate it if someone could create an example of moving an existing object/case to a new area, while explaining it. I don't want you to do this for me, as I will not learn that way. Thank you. And please don't flame, such as "OMG NOOB U DONT KNOW HOW LOLZ nOB U HAV TO RED FIRTST!@!". Please read the WHOLE post.

item.title: Global objects, yes, I have read the tut
item.dc:creator: @PatScape PatScape
item.description:
@PatScape wrote:

Thank you, that is exactly what I needed.

Read full topic
item.source: Global objects, yes, I have read the tut

item.title: Global objects, yes, I have read the tut
item.dc:creator: @liltwixis11 liltwixis11
item.description:
@liltwixis11 wrote:

if you want to add an object somewhere this is wut u put
under public void NewObjects()
you put this:
AddGlobalObject(xcoordhere, ycoordhere, objectid, direction, 10);
for the direction 0= WEST | -1 = NORTH | -2 = EAST | -3 = SOUTH
so the format is this

public void NewObjects() { AddGlobalObject(####, ####, objectid, #, 10); }

Read full topic
item.source: Global objects, yes, I have read the tut
